example[0]: a deliberate attempt to humiliate her
example[1]: The attack on him was quite deliberate.
definition[1]: deliberate speech, thought, or movement is slow and careful
example[2]: He approached her with slow, deliberate steps.
definition[2]: to think about something very carefully
example[3]: The jury deliberated for four days before acquitting him.
example[4]: There was silence while she deliberated on his words.
